history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00511
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RESTRUCTURING THE TRANSFER TAXES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE TITLE III OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Sets at three percent (3%) the real estate tax rate based on the value of such net estate in excess of One Million Pesos (P1,000,000.00).
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BARBERS, ROBERT ACE S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Savellano (015 2016-08-24)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HB04903
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2016-07-27
